ygData.subject: WOOHOO!
ygData.msgSnippet: Yesterday via email I got an email from some good friends (not my) guild for a Hate raid.   We got there and it actually wasnÔÇÖt pre-occupiedÔÇª Shortly after
ygData.messageBody:
Yesterday via email I got an email from some good friends (not my) guild for
a Hate raid. We got there and it actually wasn┬Æt pre-occupied┬à Shortly
after we got there ┬û a contingent from one of the largest guilds on the
server showed up ┬û saying they had a Warrior who just needed the Maestro
Hand for his epic ┬û (Maestro WAS up) and asked to stay and only loot that ┬û
and not to participate in any other lottos. We agreed┬à

We cleared all the mobs between SWC and the Maestro. I do
believe he came unexpected at our first attempt. Things were going pretty
good ┬û until he gravity fluxes some tanks ┬û who get stuck in the ceiling.
The Maestro proceeds to follow the tanks up and get stuck himself.

Clerics start to camp ┬û Maestro comes back down; a bit of
confusion follows ┬û some people are yelling at the clerics to cancel
camping ┬û others not ┬û I end up getting killed. Not sure if we can take him
or not ┬û probably was best to keep camping; as several tanks and several
corpses are stuck.

Fortunately the GM/Guides were having a party (year anniversery
of a Guide) and there were so many online the /who all gm list got cut off.
I┬Æve never seen a petition answered by 2 GM┬Æs in like 15 seconds! We get
the corpses and peoples unstuck ┬û and rezzed and setup again.

We had to clear several mobs ┬û but then get him when he┬Æs
ready ┬û I had my resists songs up ┬û didn┬Æt save the Chanter from Melee
damage - but the Gravity Fluxes and Life Drains were all resisted. We took
him down with only 2 deaths.

They go to loot him ┬û sadly for the Warrior ┬û no Hand; but he
had 2 count em 2 Seven String Lutes! I was the only bard on the Raid. I
gave Darkfox a tell ┬û and there was some talk between us of trying to get
him before it rotted but stupid me ┬û in all the zone spam I missed some Mage
asking if she could loot the lute for her ┬ôcollection┬ö. Not clear whether
Darkfox could have gotten up in time though.

Anyway ┬û this is my first piece of planes gear. This was my
fifth trip to Hate ┬û and on the first an Imbrued Bracer dropped but I lost
the lotto. Sure would be nice to get out of my blue pants and helmet (and
upgrade my Guardian BP)┬à

Slyde Katzenjammer
53rd Bard of Xegony
Order of Norrath
